text.title: Dinner Cuisine Network Map
text.intro: Network map of foods using terms extracted from the USDA food nutrition database and 10 years of real American dinners from What We Eat In America survey data (30,000+ meals). The clusters were learned on the descriptions of the dinner food items and their associations in the survey data using the Google-developed word2vec. word2vec is a machine learning program that employs the continuous Skip-gram model and neural networks to create feature vectors for words that describe their relative relationships.
